main event: Two unidentified objects were observed by the crew of a KC-135 aircraft on a flight to Eilson AFB, Alaska
interesting points: The objects were observed for approximately one hour between the initial sighting at 75.26N 116.02W and the final sighting at 69.03N 137.03W.
The outline of the objects was not noted because of the darkness, but they were described as flashing lights of various colors.
The aircraft commander reported that the objects pulled alongside his aircraft twice and then dropped back in trail.
While in trail, the objects had one white flashing beacon.
There was no trail, tail, or exhaust noted from the objects.
sighted object: two unidentified objects with flashing lights
location: Atlantic Ocean, near the Beaufort Sea
witnesses: crew of a KC-135 aircraft, including the aircraft commander, co-pilot, navigator, and boom operator
